name: Crane Climber
description:
Crane Climber

This game was designed and programmed in just 3 days for the Mini-Jam 128!

You are a doctor that has to climb cranes (as the title may suggest) in order to heal the confused monsters. The only unlogical thing here is the height of these cranes, almost impressive!

I apologize for the flashing screen when going up the ladder, i don't know how to fix it.

The game only has 6 different Map-Parts so it will happen that you get the same room multiple times. I hope you won't get the same part 10 times in a row lol
